title: Reading Comprehension: The History of Coffee
document: Coffee was first discovered in Ethiopia in the 11th century. Legend says a goat herder named Kaldi noticed his goats became energetic after eating berries from a certain tree...

questions.questionText: According to the legend, who first noticed the effects of coffee berries?
Based on the text, summarize in one sentence why Kaldi's goats became energetic.
questions.instruction: Your answer should be a complete sentence.
